page.title: 18Somerton Schools
page.content: { Monteclefe Junior School was originally built in 1851 and consisted of one large classroom.The dividing partition was not built until 1871 and was built by Miss Anna Maria Pinney,the sister of one of the major landowners. There has been an Infant School since 1850..There are other records that mention the Infant School being held in a barn in 1862.The original Infant School was probably a barn but was re_built for the purpose.A new Infant School was built in Etsome Terrace in 1966 for 100 children.In 1963 the Boys'Junior School and Monteclefe Girls' School were amalgamated and finally in 1964 resettled at Monteclefe School which had been partly rebuilt and re-modelled
